mapper.select: select S.member_id, s.shop_info, s.image, s.shop_name, s.shop_no, ceil(sysdate-s.open_date) as since from member M left join shop S on M.member_id = S.member_id where M.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update shop set shop_info = #{shopInfo} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from shop where shop_name = #{shopName}
mapper.update: update shop set shop_name = #{shopName} where member_id = #{memberId}
